amendment.description: To clarify the criteria for air carriers to honor tickets for suspended service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 919 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 919 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S7812-7813; text: CR S7812) To clarify the criteria for air carriers to honor tickets for suspended service.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 919 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 919 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Inouye.
